mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBJECT WHERE STATUS ='Y'

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, A.SUB_TITLE, C.DEPT_TITLE, A.SUB_DIVS, A.SUB_CREDIT, A.SUB_TIME, B.PROF_NAME FROM SUBJECT A JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_ID=B.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE=C.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SUB_CODE DESC
SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

SELECT * FROM LECT_REGISTER A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y'

SELECT A.*, B.PROF_ID, B.PROF_NAME, C.DEPT_CODE, C.DEPT_TITLE, D.ORIGIN_NAME, D.CHANGE_NAME, Q.* FROM SUBJECT A LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR B ON A.PROF_ID=B.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE=C.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN LECT_ATTACHMENT D ON A.SUB_CODE=D.SUB_CODE left join (SELECT s.SUB_CODE, avg(le.SCORE) as "SCORE" FROM SUBJECT s JOIN LECT_REGISTER lr ON s.SUB_CODE=lr.SUB_CODE JOIN LECT_EVALUATE le ON lr.LECT_REG_NO=le.LECT_REG_NO group by s.SUB_CODE)Q on A.SUB_CODE=Q.SUB_CODE WHERE A.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM LECT_REGISTER WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND STU_ID=#{stuId} AND YEAR=#{year} AND SEMESTER=#{semester} AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT SUM(B.SUB_CREDIT) FROM LECT_REGISTER A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.YEAR=#{year} AND A.SEMESTER=#{semester} AND A.STATUS='Y'

SELECT B.SUB_CODE, B.SUB_TITLE, D.DEPT_TITLE, B.SUB_DIVS, B.SUB_CREDIT, B.SUB_TIME, C.PROF_NAME FROM LECT_CART A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM LECT_CART WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND STU_ID=#{stuId} AND YEAR=#{year} AND SEMESTER=#{semester} AND STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM LECT_REGISTER A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.YEAR=#{year} AND A.SEMESTER=#{semester} AND A.STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT C SET C.STU_CREDIT=C.STU_CREDIT+(SELECT a.SUB_CREDIT FROM SUBJECT a JOIN LECT_REGISTER B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE WHERE b.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND b.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND b.YEAR=#{year} AND b.SEMESTER=#{semester}) WHERE C.STU_ID=#{stuId}

UPDATE STUDENT C SET C.STU_CREDIT=C.STU_CREDIT-(SELECT a.SUB_CREDIT FROM SUBJECT a JOIN LECT_REGISTER B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE WHERE b.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND b.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND b.YEAR=#{year} AND b.SEMESTER=#{semester}) WHERE C.STU_ID=#{stuId}
